title.@value: Conduct-dissocial disorder, adolescent onset with typical prosocial emotions

definition.@value: All definitional requirements for conduct-dissocial disorder, adolescent onset are met. The individual does not exhibit characteristics referred to as ‘callous and unemotional’, such as lack of empathy or sensitivity to the feelings of others and a lack of concern for others’ distress.

label.@value: Conduct-dissocial disorder, adolescent onset with typical prosocial emotions
